Jody makes Fergus promise he'll visit his girlfriend, Dil, in London, and when Fergus flees to the city, he seeks her out. Hounded by his former IRA colleagues, he finds himself increasingly drawn to the enigmatic, and surprising, Dil.","poster_path":"/ynEfiiwS0dosbPjzGqBLo7FXMlD.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[80,18,53],"popularity":17.791,"release_date":"1992-09-02","video":false,"vote_average":6.834,"vote_count":719},{"backdrop_path":"/2NU8w8djgX6SzLrg7rN6yMXWAzC.jpg","id":7863,"title":"Shine","original_title":"Shine","overview":"Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.","poster_path":"/cbmThowj2XAW7lKlMAXmnhZvjGI.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":15.417,"release_date":"1996-08-15","video":false,"vote_average":7.388,"vote_count":630},{"backdrop_path":"/zuqlxhakxihY2XGXbGW6wTq5kYE.jpg","id":27103,"title":"My Life in Pink","original_title":"Ma vie en rose","overview":"Ludovic is waiting for a miracle. With six-year-old certainty, she believes she was meant to be a little girl -- and that the mistake will soon be corrected. But where she expects the miraculous, Ludo finds only rejection, isolation and guilt -- as the intense reactions of family, friends, and neighbors strip away every innocent lace and bauble.  As suburban prejudices close around them, family loves and loyalties are tested in the ever-escalating dramatic turns of Alain Berliner's critically acclaimed first feature. Winner of the Golden Globe for Best Foreign Language Film and a favorite at festivals around the world, this unique film experience delivers magic of the rarest sort through a story of difference, rejection, and childlike faith in miracles.","poster_path":"/4SwZaSDy1DR80QXKdvp6iSTawK2.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18,35],"popularity":13.302,"release_date":"1997-05-28","video":false,"vote_average":6.955,"vote_count":99},{"backdrop_path":"/pFvZvpe7dLFLBP39QONWnT7Fctq.jpg","id":36758,"title":"The Portrait of a Lady","original_title":"The Portrait of a Lady","overview":"Ms. Isabel Archer isn't afraid to challenge societal norms. Impressed by her free spirit, her kindhearted cousin writes her into his fatally ill father's will. Suddenly rich and independent, Isabelle ventures into the world, along the way befriending a cynical intellectual and romancing an art enthusiast. However, the advantage of her affluence is called into question when she realizes the extent to which her money colors her relationships.","poster_path":"/yoUuMtWTQXzfARYE0nF7Nn7gRuS.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,10749],"popularity":14.26,"release_date":"1996-10-17","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":223},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":58500,"title":"The Butterfly Circus","original_title":"The Butterfly Circus","overview":"At the height of the Great Depression, the showman of a renowned circus leads his troupe through the devastated American landscape, lifting the spirits of audiences along the way. During their travels, they discover a man without limbs at a carnival sideshow. However, after an intriguing encounter with the showman, he becomes driven to hope against everything he has ever believed.","poster_path":"/eQUQbZ4HjlSEUaKUtOvbOpz2Zl3.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":5.646,"release_date":"2009-08-31","video":false,"vote_average":7.4,"vote_count":121},{"backdrop_path":"/cSVIQcChsIqaP7frfaiXTTH3vOM.jpg","id":308640,"title":"Songs My Brothers Taught Me","original_title":"Songs My Brothers Taught Me","overview":"This complex portrait of modern-day life on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation explores the bond between a brother and his younger sister, who find themselves on separate paths to rediscovering the meaning of home.","poster_path":"/2DiiYoVGtNkvvM8mc5UMIalH7OC.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":9.587,"release_date":"2015-09-09","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":95},{"backdrop_path":"/lpVmsGEWVAvQdzZObTxdidMX8le.jpg","id":34377,"title":"The Boys in the Band","original_title":"The Boys in the Band","overview":"A witty, perceptive and devastating look at the personal agendas and suppressed revelations swirling among a group of gay men in Manhattan. Harold is celebrating a birthday, and his friend Michael has drafted some other friends to help commemorate the event. As the evening progresses, the alcohol flows, the knives come out, and Michael's demand that the group participate in a devious telephone game, unleashing dormant and unspoken emotions.","poster_path":"/zgPdZZkM2EVOFlw3e7qEmZv6Po8.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":10.846,"release_date":"1970-03-16","video":false,"vote_average":7.031,"vote_count":98},{"backdrop_path":"/cp9NMnRokXvqYUmmq3uf3UFVlov.jpg","id":47714,"title":"The Stolen Children","original_title":"Il ladro di bambini","overview":"Antonio, a policeman (carabiniere), has an order to take two children (Rosetta and her brother Luciano) from Milan to Sicily to an orphanage. It is about a primary school in the commune of Saint-Étienne-sur-Usson, Puy-de-Dôme, France, the population of which is just over 200. The school has one small class of mixed ages (from four to twelve years), with a dedicated teacher, Georges Lopez, who shows patience and respect for the children as we follow their story through a single school year.","poster_path":"/mqB5QPNCmbF8DgsZqmyGQAGktUE.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":12.151,"release_date":"2002-08-28","video":false,"vote_average":7.244,"vote_count":127},{"backdrop_path":"/fensSW5qw8nSYg6qmO6Dm6xEIr7.jpg","id":7509,"title":"Water","original_title":"Water","overview":"The year is 1938, and Mahatma Gandhi's groundbreaking philosophies are sweeping across India, but 8-year-old Chuyia, newly widowed, must go to live with other outcast widows on an ashram. Her presence transforms the ashram as she befriends two of her compatriots.","poster_path":"/bWgthg4wwAmyu6FoyC006IQU9JN.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"hi","genre_ids":[18,10749],"popularity":18.172,"release_date":"2005-09-08","video":false,"vote_average":6.858,"vote_count":113},{"backdrop_path":"/2V0BWE7WJWP627Yivsnfx4uKUCp.jpg","id":2891,"title":"An Angel at My Table","original_title":"An Angel at My Table","overview":"Based on the autobiographical work of New Zealand writer Janet Frame, this production depicts the author at various stage of her life. Afflicted with mental and emotional issues, Frame grows up in an impoverished family and experiences numerous tragedies while still in her youth, including the deaths of two of her siblings. Portrayed as an adult by Kerry Fox, Frame finds acclaim for her writing while still in a mental institution, and her success helps her move on with her life.","poster_path":"/sDICHxQRDkS4TvIDcUgO9URJxu1.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":10.628,"release_date":"1990-09-20","video":false,"vote_average":7.051,"vote_count":147},{"backdrop_path":"/4K56Mig0AoCiBDPkQiKZ0dMUABe.jpg","id":61659,"title":"Dance with Him","original_title":"Danse avec lui","overview":"Three years after simultaneously parting with a philanderer husband and experiencing a dramatic fall during a horse jumping contest, Alexandra Balzan, a Parisian architect, regains an appetite for life and love after a chance encounter with an aging misanthrope of a master horseman and his horse","poster_path":"/9EsqeUzwaQ5sDCH6F0HFMHo55x8.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35,18],"popularity":6.1,"release_date":"2007-02-21","video":false,"vote_average":6.694,"vote_count":67},{"backdrop_path":"/2CqkiCDXftfhTGMy3odCgTFkHP5.jpg","id":22549,"title":"Ulysses' Gaze","original_title":"Το βλέμμα του Οδυσσέα","overview":"An exiled filmmaker finally returns to his home country where former mysteries and afflictions of his early life come back to haunt him once more.","poster_path":"/lj3pmqiy15O1KyljPRb4k2rb5XO.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"el","genre_ids":[18,36,10752],"popularity":13.278,"release_date":"1995-10-12","video":false,"vote_average":7.3,"vote_count":99},{"backdrop_path":"/jlUSRGkcPDNYAhxlezdohFHrDCa.jpg","id":61461,"title":"The Children Are Watching Us","original_title":"I bambini ci guardano","overview":"In his first collaboration with renowned screenwriter and longtime partner Cesare Zavattini, Vittorio De Sica examines the cataclysmic consequences of adult folly on an innocent child.
